org.cleverbus.test
Class AbstractDbTest

java.lang.Object
  org.cleverbus.test.AbstractTest
      org.cleverbus.test.AbstractDbTest

@ContextConfiguration(locations="classpath:/META-INF/test_persistence.xml")
@TransactionConfiguration(transactionManager="jpaTxManager")
public abstract class AbstractDbTest
extends AbstractTest

Extends AbstractTest and adds support for test with database.

Author:
Petr Juza
